title: Using the Ninja Easy Frother™
description:
Easily transform milk into rich, creamy foam perfect for your favorite Ninja Coffee Bar™ specialty drinks like caramel macchiatos and flat whites.

Learn more about the Ninja Coffee Bar™ at http://www.ninjacoffeebar.com. 

Get recipes for your Ninja Coffee Bar at http://www.ninjakitchen.com/recipes.
